ygData.subject: Re: Skill Changes
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh -- gotta admit, EQ has put a drastic reduction on how much TV I watch. I guess if you look at it that way, it doesn t seem quite so bad.  Rach ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Heh -- gotta admit, EQ has put a drastic reduction on how much TV I watch.
I guess if you look at it that way, it doesn't seem quite so bad. <G>

Rach

----- Original Message -----
From: Lemac Justerian <lemac@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 3:54 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Skill Changes


> From: "Lemac Justerian" <lemac@...>
>
> > From: "Vegue, Tony 1047" <tonyv@...>
> >
> > Good point -- a typical work year is 2080 hours. I did a /play and I
felt
> > like I was hit with a brick. I clocked about 400 hours since the game
> came
> > out, in March. I started the day it came out. Do you know what I could
> do
> > with my life with 400 extra hours?
> >
> > Needless to say, I quit the game this week.
>
> Wow! I guess we could watch the average 23 hours of TV per week like the
> rest of the country does... Hmmm... wait... that's MORE!!
>
> Or, we could work an extra 20 hours a week??
>
> I don;t know about the rest of you, but I work to live, I do NOT live to
> work! I live to have FUN because that is what *I* believe life is all
> about... Having a GOOD time, a GOOD life, and trying to help others do the
> same thing! But again, that is MY thoughts and opinions, but it's also my
> life...
>
> Sorry to hear you are quiting Tony!
>
> Lemac
>
